question.text: You are about to overtake a slow-moving motorcyclist. Which one of these signs would make you take special care?

explanation.text: In windy weather, watch out for motorcyclists and also cyclists as they can be blown sideways into your path. When you pass them, leave plenty of room and check their position in your mirror before pulling back in.
